aircraft.value: Atlas Cargo - AC-9421-542 at Base Echo

defect_observed.value: Fastener hole elongation. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 25/01/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 27/01/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 27/01/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 31/01/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 04/02/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
